thread.title: Excellent NYC Hotel in Great Location
thread.title_full: Excellent NYC Hotel in Great Location - Review of The Ritz-Carlton New York, Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Bill_Verhelle
title: Excellent NYC Hotel in Great Location
text: This is an excellent hotel in a great location on Central Park South. The staff is exceptional. The Club Lounge is fantastic, due to the very professional team that runs it. Overall, this property is one of the finest high-end hotels in NYC.
